segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing a plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the sink at all, which is quite astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just cascading over the edge, forming a pool on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, submerged in the spreading puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly incredible how unaware she remains of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of running water must be quite loud, yet she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stacked dishes to her right, waiting to be cleaned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This overflowing sink is going to cause some serious water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope she looks down before someone slips or something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a calm, almost serene posture, despite the growing chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is now completely covering the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she's thinking about, so lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical, if it weren’t so concerning to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
